subject: Question of delivery
description_text:
Hello im interested for one set of Simsonn Plus X and i wnat to confirm
that you make shiping to the canary islands.



<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Libre
de virus.www.avast.com
<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>

conversations.body_text: Hi Cristóbal,    We can ship to the Canary Islands, but additional shipping fees will apply based on the address, approximately $30–$60.
